text: today I'm going to take the slack out of a strand of Barb Wire here on my fence that has gotten loose and I'm going to use this device called a wire tightener this is a jake wire tightener there's several Brands I'm not getting paid for promoting Jake that's just happen to be the one I have and I'm going to put it on here and tighten this strand def fence that's all there is to it makes it tight as a banjo string
